name: Panzer Doctrine
description: Panzer Doctrine is an unconventional World War II real-time strategy game. It was designed to provide an interesting alternative to turn-based hex grid wargames involving complex military simulation of tank warfare on the eastern front.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 Ghz Dual-Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
